name: 2d-platformer-game
description: A 2D side-scrolling platformer game built with Phaser.js and TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run fix-extensions
scripts.fix-extensions: find dist -name '*.js' -exec sed -i '' 's|from "\.\(/[^"]*\)"|from "\.\1.js"|g' {} \; && find dist -name '*.js' -exec sed -i '' 's|from "\.\.\(/[^"]*\)"|from "\.\.\1.js"|g' {} \;
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run build:watch & npx http-server -p 8000 -o
scripts.preview: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 8000 -o

author: Game Developer
